channel.title: mongolite on The Amateur Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in mongolite on The Amateur Data Scientist

item.title: Filtering MongoDB by Date in R
item.description: 1 MongoDB at Work 2 ISODate 3 Unix Epoch and $numberLong 4 as.POSIXct() and POSIXt = "epoch" 5 Session Info References 1 MongoDB at Work Some of the most important data I use at work are stored and access in MongoDB. We also use SQL1, but I often find myself reliant on using MongoDB most of the time since my shift to a data science role.
